pullrequest.title: Make sphere move around in world sim api tutorial

content.raw: Looks good to me. Just one suggestion: The ball is not aligned with the fingers, so you have to teleoperate the arm to force the contact between the ball and the fingers. I changed the ball position for not having to do it in [this branch](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/commits/52c17e14aa3ad6842efd5786d1514c836b34493e).
content.html: Looks good to me. Just one suggestion: The ball is not aligned with the fingers, so you have to teleoperate the arm to force the contact between the ball and the fingers. I changed the ball position for not having to do it in this branch.
